PERSONAL & CONFIDENTIAL

RE: ${claim_number}

 

Dear:${contact_name}

 

You may recall that a matter was reported to MEDICUS involving the above-captioned patient.

There has been no recent activity in this matter and we are now closing our file.

Please be advised that each state has a "statute of limitations" which establishes a period within which the claimant must file a complaint in court. Many states expand or toll the limitations period under certain circumstances, including fraud, injuries to minors, and a variety of other reasons. Therefore, although it appears the statute of limitations to file a complaint by this claimant may likely have passed, should you receive any further communication or documents concerning this matter, please contact our office immediately before responding so that we can reopen our file.

Please do not make this letter part of the patient’s medical chart.

We would like to thank you for your patience and cooperation during the pendency of this matter.

Very truly yours,
